eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily

Interface SufficientStatistics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Vector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayVector, CompoundVector, EF_Normal_NormalParents.CompoundVector, KeyCompoundVector

    public interface SufficientStatistics
extends Vector
    This interface extends the interface Vector and handles classes for representing the sufficient statistics vector of an exponential family distribution in canonical form.

    For further details about how exponential family models are considered in this toolbox, take a look at the following paper: Representation, Inference and Learning of Bayesian Networks as Conjugate Exponential Family Models. Technical Report. (pdf)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SufficientStatistics sumVector(SufficientStatistics vec1, SufficientStatistics vec2)
      Sums two sufficient statistics vectors having the same size.

      • Methods inherited from interface eu.amidst.core.utils.Vector

        copy, divideBy, dotProduct, equalsVector, get, multiplyBy, set, size, substract, sum, sum, sumVector

    • Method Detail

      • sumVector

        static SufficientStatistics sumVector(SufficientStatistics vec1,
                                      SufficientStatistics vec2)
        Sums two sufficient statistics vectors having the same size.
        Parameters:
        vec1 - a first input SufficientStatistics object.
        vec2 - a second input SufficientStatistics object.
        Returns:
        a SufficientStatistics object including the sum of the two input vectors.
